item.title: Self service with Fluid Templating for editors in Optimizely CMS
item.description: A classic need in many websites - especially self-service sites - is a placeholder mechanism, so editors can use placeholders in their text to be replaced with user specific data. Recently, working with a client, we ran into this problem and tried out a new approach to empower the content creators to solve this themselves.
item.author: (Allan Thraen)
